name: serverless-express-auth
description: Example application for running a Node Express app on AWS Lambda using Amazon API Gateway.

scripts.deploy: cross-var aws cloudformation deploy --template-file sam-template.packaged.yaml --stack-name $npm_package_config_cloudFormationStackName --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region $npm_package_config_region --parameter-overrides DomainName=$npm_package_config_domain
scripts.package-deploy: npm run build && npm run package && npm run deploy
